column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tahno says : " Hey , Korra . "
#Text=Korra says : " Tahno ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Listen , I know we 're not exactly best friends , but I 'm sorry Amon took your bending . "
#Text=Tahno says : " I 've been to the best healers in the city .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " I 'm happy to help any way I can .
#Text=I want these Equalists to pay for what they 've done .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " We 're ready for you now .
#Text=" Tahno says : " See you around ... " Ah " vatar .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Earthbending bomb !
#Text=" Butler says : " Avatar Korra ... has arrived .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey , Korra !
#Text=" Asami says : " Glad you made it !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Welcome to paradise !
#Text=" Korra says : " Looks like you guys settled right in .
#Text=" Mako says : " Pretty much , except someone forgot to ask her father if we could stay here .
#Text=" Asami says : " Yeah , but I smoothed it over with him .
#Text=It 's easier to ask for forgiveness than permission .
#Text=" Bolin says : " This is the greatest place in the world !
#Text=Watch this , watch this .
#Text=Fetch me my towel , good sir .
#Text=" Butler says : " Yes , Master ... Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Master Bolin !
#Text=Ha , I love this guy .
#Text=Now pat me dry .
#Text=" Butler says : " As you wish .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Do n't forget Master Pabu .
#Text=" Butler says : " Would n't dream of it , sir .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , what do you have planned for us today ?
#Text=Let me guess , shopping , makeovers ... " Bolin says : " Ooh , Ooh !
#Text=I vote makeovers !
#Text=" Asami says : " I had something a little more exciting in mind .
#Text="
